title: Grilled Cheese Ham and Egg Sandwich
ingredients: ▢ 1 slice of Swiss or cheddar cheese
instructions: Heat a nonstick frying pan.
Spread half of the butter on one side of the first bread slice.
When the pan becomes hot, put in the bread (buttered side down)
Arrange the cheese and ham on top of the bread.
Spread the remaining butter on the second bread slice. Top the second bread slice on the ham (buttered side up). Let it cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until the cheese melts.
Flip the bread using a spatula to cook the other side of the bread. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes.
Remove the bread from the pan and then place in a plate.
Remove the second bread slice and arrange the egg on top of the ham. Put the second bread slice over the egg.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Sautéed String Beans with Chicken
ingredients: ▢ 4 cups string beans cut about 2 1/2 inch length
▢ 1/4 lb. boneless chicken breast sliced into thin pieces
instructions: Heat the cooking oil in a pan.
Sauté the garlic and onion
Add the chicken slices. Cook for 3 minutes.
Put-in the soy sauce, oyster sauce, and water. Stir and then cover the pan. Simmer until the water nearly evaporates.
Increase the heat to high and then add the string beans. Cook while stirring for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Transfer to a serving plate. Top with French fried onion.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Scallop and Zucchini Stir fry
ingredients: ▢ 1 1/2 cup sliced red orange, and yellow sweet peppers
instructions: Heat the cooking oil in a wok.
Sauté the garlic and onion
Add the scallops. Cook for 1 minute.
Put-in the zucchini. Stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Add the sweet peppers, spinach, and fish sauce. Continue to stir-fry for 2 to 3 minutes.
Sprinkle some ground black pepper to taste.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve with fried rice. Share and enjoy!

title: Barbecue Pork Chop with Mixed Veggies
ingredients: ▢ 2 cups of hickory and brown sugar BBQ sauce
instructions: Season the pork chop with salt and pepper.
Coat the pork chops with barbecue sauce. Let it stay for 3 hours.
Meanwhile, melt the butter in a pan.
Add the mixed vegetables. Cook for 5 minutes.
Sprinkle some salt and pepper to taste. Set aside.
Grill the pork chops in medium heat for about 10 to 12 minutes per side (depending on thickness). Baste with remaining BBQ sauce.
Transfer on a serving plate. Serve with mixed veggies and mashed potatoes.
Share and enjoy!

title: Mushroom and Spinach Omelet
instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan.
When the oil is hot, put-in the mushroom. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add the spinach. Sprinkle salt and pepper. Stir and then cook for 1 to 2 minutes. Remove from the pan. Set aside.
Crack the eggs and place in a bowl. Add salt and pepper. Beat the eggs until the texture becomes soft.
Wipe the pan with clean paper towel. Heat it again and then pour-in half of the remaining olive oil.
When the oil starts to get hot, pour half of the beaten egg mixture in the pan. Spread the egg so that it will be cooked evenly.
When the eggs are cooked halfway, scoop half of the cooked spinach and mushroom and then arrange on one end of the egg.
Fold the other end of the egg using a spatula to cover the spinach and mushroom.
Gently slide the omelet to a serving plate.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Fried Fish Sandwich
ingredients: ▢ 4 pieces Kaiser Roll or hamburger bun
instructions: Sprinkle salt and pepper on the mahi-mahi fillets.
Heat the cooking oil in a frying pan.
Dredge the mahi-mahi in flour and then dip in beaten egg.
Roll the fish fillet in Panko breadcrumbs while pressing a little to ensure that the crumbs stick.
Pan-fry each side in low to medium heat for about 4 to 5 minutes.
Remove from the pan and place in a plate lined with paper towel.
Assemble the sandwich by arranging the tomato and lettuce. Put the fried fish fillet in and then top with tartar sauce.
Serve with sweet potato fries.
Share and enjoy!

title: Tartar Sauce Recipe
instructions: Combine mayonnaise and lemon juice in a bowl. Mix well.
Whisk in the sweet pickle relish and onion.
Add salt and pepper and then continue whisking until all the ingredients are well incorporated.
Cover and then chill in the fridge for a couple of hours.
Serve with your favorite fried fish dishes.
Share and enjoy!

title: Hoisin Glazed Grilled Tofu
ingredients: ▢ 14 oz. extra firm tofu sliced into 1/2 inch thick pieces
▢ A pinch of salt and pepper
instructions: Combine hoisin sauce, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Brush the mixture all over the tofu to coat. Let it stand for 1 hour.
Grill the tofu in medium heat for about 10 minutes per side. Baste with the remaining hoisin sauce mixture.
Transfer to a serving plate. Serve with steamed broccoli.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Grilled Ribs with Pico de Gallo
instructions: Combine the soy sauce, lemon juice, garlic powder, chili powder, ground black pepper, and Worcestershire sauce in a bowl. Mix well.
Place the spare ribs in a resealable bag. Pour-in the mixture and then marinate for at least 6 hours.
Make the basting sauce by pouring the remaining marinade in a bowl. Add the ketchup. Stir.
Grill the spare ribs for about 8 to 10 minutes per side. You can rotate the ribs to prevent it from getting dry or burnt. Make sure to baste the ribs when rotating.
Transfer to a serving plate. Serve with pico de gallo.
Share and enjoy!

title: Grilled Calamari
ingredients: ▢ 2 lbs. small to medium squid cleaned
▢ a pinch of salt and pepper
instructions: Combine soy sauce, Sriracha sauce, sugar, lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Mix well.
Place the squid inside a freezer bag and then pour-in the soy sauce mixture. Marinate for 1 hour.
Skewer the squid in bamboo skewers. Grill for about 3 to 5 minutes per side. Baste with remaining marinade.
Transfer to a serving plate
Serve with rice. Share and enjoy!

title: Curried Potato Salad
instructions: Pour water on a cooking pot. Let boil.
Add the potatoes and a teaspoon of salt. Boil for 18 to 23 minutes. Remove from the cooking pot, Let cool and then cube.
Meanwhile, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, sweet pickle relish, curry powder, salt, and ground black pepper in a mixing bowl. Mix well.
Add the onion, celery and potatoes. Gently mix until the ingredients are well incorporated.
Chill in the fridge for 3 hours.
Top with almonds and sunflower seeds.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Oven Baked Crusted Pork Loin
instructions: Sprinkle salt and pepper on the sliced pork. Gently rub and then let it stand for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
Dredge the pork in flour and then dip in beaten egg. Place the pork in the bowl with the breadcrumbs and press a little to let the bread crumbs coat and stick.
Heat olive oil in a pan.
Pan-fry the crusted pork in low to medium heat for about 3 to 4 minutes per side.
Transfer the pan fried pork in an oven tray. Bake for 20 minutes.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve with your favorite condiment. Share and enjoy!
